name: Alien Missile Bombardment
description:
Armageddon awaits players who dare take on the Alien Missile Bombardment game. This game is based off the Missile Command game of yesteryear from Atari Inc. 

Here is what you will find in the Alien Missile Bombardment template:
- Choose from 4 planets to defend.
- Defend from 6 to 8 cities from the falling alien missiles.
- Randomly generated alien missiles that target the player's cities. Two kinds of alien missiles - a basic and a advanced version that takes an extra hit.
- Player missiles that launch and detonate where the player last clicked; one missile contributed from each city.
- Create chain explosions as your shot takes out multiple alien missiles.
- A scrolling playing area to give players even greater challenge. Just hold the RMB (right mouse button) and scroll your mouse to the left/right edge.
- A warning symbol indication for when missiles are off-screen.
- Obscuring clouds that introduce an extra element of concealment.
- Sound effects including missile explosions, city destruction, sirens for extra powerful alien missiles
- A scoring area showing relevant game information.

ps - This game is still under development. Please let us know in the comments section if you find any bugs or have any suggestions and feedback. Thanks.
